summary: During WW2, the U.S. Navy implements a new idea of forming construction battalions that also are fighting units, in case of Japanese attack.
cast: John Wayne|Susan Hayward|Dennis O'Keefe|William Frawley|Leonid Kinskey|J.M. Kerrigan|Grant Withers|Paul Fix|Ben Welden|William Forrest|Addison Richards|Jay Norris|Duncan Renaldo|Abdullah Abbas|Lee Adams|Joel Allen|Walter Bacon|Roy Barcroft|Roy Brent|Joe Brooks|Charles D. Brown|George Bruggeman|Wheaton Chambers|Roy Darmour|Kenne Duncan|Jean Fenwick|George Ford|Terry Frost|Gene Gary|Bud Geary|Rudy Germane|Ernest Golm|Kit Guard|Eddie Hall|William Hall|Alex Havier|Herbert Heyes|Reed Howes|John James|Robert Katcher|Nora Lane|James B. Leong|Jung Lim|Beverly Lloyd|Tom London|Clarence Lung|George Magrill|Adele Mara|Frank Marlowe|LeRoy Mason|Charles Meakin|Harold Miller|Charles Mitchell|Bert Moorhouse|Al Murphy|Forbes Murray|Jack O'Shea|Paul Parry|Hugh Prosser|Joey Ray|Cyril Ring|Jeffrey Sayre|George Sherwood|Tom Steele|Larry Stewart|Clarence Straight|Charles Sullivan|Ben Taggart|Hal Taliaferro|Chief Thundercloud|Charles Trowbridge|Billy Wayne|Crane Whitley|Robert J. Wilke|Buddy Wilkerson
title: Batallón de construcción
